The Clock Hostel And Suites is located just a few blocks away from the iconic Clock Tower within the walled city in Cartagena, Colombia. So close to restaurants, bars, 24/7 grocery shopping, museums and coffee shops.

Each room hold 20 dorms (single, double and penthouse). Each rooms have 3 unisex bathrooms. On the other hand we also have 2 suites with private bathroom, tv Directv and Netflix. Every dorm or suite includes kitchen, free wifi, air conditioning, locker, jacuzzi – hot tub, chill room with games and tv, washer-dryer machine.

The Clock Hostel & Suites in Cartagena de Indias provides adults-only accommodation with a restaurant, a shared lounge and a garden. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The rooms come with a patio.
The units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a microwave, a coffee machine, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hostel all rooms come with a seating area.
The Clock Hostel & Suites offers a continental or American breakfast.
The accommodation offers a hot tub. You can play table tennis at The Clock Hostel & Suites.

Popular points of interest near the hostel include Bolivar Park, Cartagena's Gold Museum and Palace of the Inquisition. The nearest airport is Rafael Núñez International Airport, 6 km from The Clock Hostel & Suites.
Centro is a great choice for travellers interested in restaurants, architecture and food.

description.description: The Clock Hostel And Suites is one of the most innovative places in town according to the new styling in hostels around the world, backpacker but no that so, cool and comfortable facilities, semiprivate dorms with blackouts, connectivity, outdoors patio with an amazing hot tub (jacuzzi) and our amazing staff and host guiding our guests through their visit to the city.
